document.full_text: tens of thousands of people filled madrid's puerta del sol on saturday evening to protest high unemployment and austerity measures, defying a ban on demonstrations on the eve of local elections.
document.title: spaniards protest before elections despite ban
lines_and_colors: tens of thousands of people filled madrid's puerta del sol on saturday evening to protest high unemployment and austerity measures, defying a ban on demonstrations on the eve of local elections.
